description: This file defines a Java interface for user data persistence operations, extending JpaRepository to provide CRUD methods and custom queries for User entities.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A repository interface for performing database operations related to User entities, leveraging Spring Data JPA functionalities.

methods.name: findByEmail
methods.description: Finds a User entity by its email address, returns an Optional<User>.

methods.name: existsByEmail
methods.description: Checks if a User exists with the given email address.
